title: Anyone know what this serif is?
content:
This is in the masthead for a University of Michigan online news publication. I’ve spent a good amount of time trying to ID it but have come up empty so far.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091212105231im_/http:/typophile.com/files/RECORD_3582.jpg)
author: circlehdon

comments.content:
seems to be [Constantia](http://web.archive.org/web/20091212105231/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/ascender/constantia/regular/), acoording to whatthefont.

greetings Jeffrey  
 [infraordinaire](http://web.archive.org/web/20091212105231/http:/www.infraordinaire.com/wordpress)

Ah, and it’s included in office 2007 and Windows Vista.

greetings Jeffrey  
 [infraordinaire](http://web.archive.org/web/20091212105231/http:/www.infraordinaire.com/wordpress)

Fantastic! I knew the experts here would know the answer. I tried Identifont to no avail, so I’ll try Whatthefont next time. It never occurred to me that this font would live primarily in the Windows world. Thanks, Jeffrey.
